title: Fidelity survey
author: VD
content_html: In light of the interesting information provided by the previous questionnaire, I’ve posted another set of questions related to one’s historical fidelity or lack thereof. It’s entirely anonymous, so you want to add to the data available for crunching, please visit Alpha Game and answer the seven questions there.
content_text:
In light of the interesting information provided by the previous questionnaire, I’ve posted
another set of questions
related to one’s historical fidelity or lack thereof.  It’s entirely anonymous, so you want to add to the data available for crunching, please visit Alpha Game and answer the seven questions there.
